org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel

Interface TableHTMLModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Model, TableModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Models.CompoundModel

    public interface TableHTMLModel
extends TableModel
    Use this to separate value and the HTML value. When displaying a property value, then if the value is a String and if it contains a HTML code, it's automatically rendered as HTML. The HTML code is then stripped out to get the raw value. If this is not desired or if it's necessary to provide a value and HTML code that differs from each other, implement this model.
    Since:
    1.42
    See Also:
    TableHTMLModelFilter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getHTMLValueAt(Object node, String columnID)
      Get the HTML value.
      boolean hasHTMLValueAt(Object node, String columnID)
      Test if the model has a HTML value.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.netbeans.spi.viewmodel.TableModel

        addModelListener, getValueAt, isReadOnly, removeModelListener, setValueAt

    • Method Detail

      • hasHTMLValueAt

        boolean hasHTMLValueAt(Object node,
                       String columnID)
                throws UnknownTypeException
        Test if the model has a HTML value. For backward compatibility, if it returns false, HTML value is is taken from the String value, if it contains some. If this is not desired, return true here and null from getHTMLValueAt(java.lang.Object, java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        node - an object returned from TreeModel.getChildren(java.lang.Object, int, int) for this row
        columnID - an id of column defined by ColumnModel.getID()
        Returns:
        true if there is some HTML value to be returned from getHTMLValueAt(java.lang.Object, java.lang.String), false otherwise. When false is returned, getHTMLValueAt(java.lang.Object, java.lang.String) is not called.
        Throws:
        UnknownTypeException - if there is nothing to be provided for the given parameter type

      • getHTMLValueAt

        String getHTMLValueAt(Object node,
                      String columnID)
               throws UnknownTypeException
        Get the HTML value.
        Parameters:
        node - an object returned from TreeModel.getChildren(java.lang.Object, int, int) for this row
        columnID - an id of column defined by ColumnModel.getID()
        Returns:
        The HTML value, or null when no HTML value is provided.
        Throws:
        UnknownTypeException - if there is nothing to be provided for the given parameter type
        See Also:
        hasHTMLValueAt(java.lang.Object, java.lang.String)
